content:
Check:
  all:
    - name:
      operator:
    - name: FAOBJ
      operator: is_not_contained_by
      value:
        - --TERM
    - name: FAOBJ
      operator: is_not_contained_by
      value:
        - --TERM
    - name: FAOBJ
      operator: is_not_contained_by
      value:
        - --TERM
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0174
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when a related record is present in the parent domain dataset
  and FAOBJ is not in (--TERM, --TRT, --DECOD)
Outcome:
  Message: Related record is present in the parent domain dataset and FAOBJ is not
    in (--TERM, --TRT, --DECOD)
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0174
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: If an FA record does have a parent record, the value
                  in FAOBJ should match the value in --TERM or --TRT, unless the parent
                  domain is dictionary coded or subject to controlled terminology,
                  in which case FAOBJ should match the value in --DECOD.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: 6.4.3
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - FA

json.Description: Trigger error when a related record is present in the parent domain dataset and FAOBJ is not in (--TERM, --TRT, --DECOD)

Outcome.Message: Related record is present in the parent domain dataset and FAOBJ is not in (--TERM, --TRT, --DECOD)

Citations.Cited_Guidance: If an FA record does have a parent record, the value in FAOBJ should match the value in --TERM or --TRT, unless the parent domain is dictionary coded or subject to controlled terminology, in which case FAOBJ should match the value in --DECOD.
